data.text: Maguta eAroeri achasiyiwa uye achava mafuro ezvipfuyo,
Maguta akakomberedzwa namasvingo achanyangarika achibva pana Efuremu,
Pazuva iro vanhu vachatarira kuMusiki wavo,
Pazuva iro maguta avo akasimba avakasiya nokuda kwavaIsraeri, achafanana nenzvimbo dzakaregerwa kuti dzive matenhere nezvinomera pasi pavo. Uye ose achava matongo.
kunyange pazuva raunoisima, ugoita kuti ikure,
Kunyange vanhu vakaomba sokutinhira kwamafungu emvura,
